short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Chrome extension that provides end-to-end encryption for Gmail. Encrypt private emails and securely share files up to 10GB.
short.de: Chrome-Erweiterung, die eine Ende-zu-Ende-Verschlüsselung für Gmail bietet. Verschlüsseln Sie private E-Mails und geben Sie Dateien…
short.es: Extensión de Chrome que proporciona cifrado de extremo a extremo para Gmail. Cifra los correos electrónicos privados y comparte…
short.fi: Chrome-laajennus, joka tarjoaa kattavan salauksen Gmailille. Salaa yksityisviestit ja jaa turvallisesti jopa 10 Gt viestejä.
short.fr: Une extension pour Chrome qui propose un chiffrement de bout en bout pour Gmail. Chiffrez les e-mails privés et partagez en toute…
short.it: Estensione di Chrome che fornisce la crittografia end-to-end per Gmail. Crittografa le e-mail private e condividi in modo sicuro…
short.ja: Gmail向けにエンドツーエンドの暗号化を提供するChrome拡張機能です。プライベートなメールを暗号化し、最大10GBのファイルを安全に共有します。
short.nl: Chrome-extensie die end-to-end-versleuteling voor Gmail levert. Versleutel privé-e-mails en deel beveiligde bestanden tot wel 10GB.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie do Chrome zapewniające pełne szyfrowanie Gmaila. Szyfruj prywatne wiadomości e-mail i bezpiecznie udostępniaj pliki do…
short.sv: Chrome-tillägg som ger end-to-end-kryptering för Gmail. Kryptera privata e-postmeddelande och dela filer på upp till 10 GB på ett…
short.zh_CN: 为 Gmail 提供端到端加密的 Chrome 扩展程序。加密私密的电子邮件，安全地共享最大 10GB 的文件。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the SendSafely Chrome Extension, you can send encrypted files and messages directly from Gmail or using our Chrome pop-out menu.  It's never been easier for Chrome or Google Mail users to use SendSafely.  

SendSafely is an end-to-end encryption platform that eliminates the need for pre-shared encryption keys and passwords. With SendSafely, nobody other than you and the people you send items to can view them...not even us.  

- Built on OpenPGP: OpenPGP is the most widely used email encryption standard in the world. It's been in development and use for years, and proves to be the best encryption available today. 

- Multi Factor Authentication: We offer an extra layer of security to keep your information secure. When users access items sent using SendSafely, they are prompted for a username and password, along with a unique SMS code.

- No Software for Recipients: With SendSafely, the people you share items with don't need to download or install on anything on their computer.  If they have a web browser, they can receive your files.
